title: Printing plate for image of couple on night street surrounded by ghouls
marks:
Signature and Inscription

on back of block, in  LLC, in relief (in reverse): [R / H]
description: zinc plate for printing attached to wooden block; image of couple in LRC, with woman in hooded cloak and man in top hat and overcoat with walking stick, on a narrow street at night, surrounded by ghostly figures and fantastic people; night sky with crescent moon, ULC, with stars; smoke from chimney in ULQ; fragments of paper affixed to back
creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
